name: Sandbox Game 2
description:
The Sequel of Sandbox Game ( the game here: https://zackydev.itch.io/sandbox-game)

All with new fonts, new maps, and the brand new "PostProcessing".

new 2 maps:

RockLand - This Island is full of Rocks and some of them are pickable, with abandoned stractures

NightLight - An Island full of weird structures and some broken StreetLamps.

Download and Play the Game Now
